name: ForumThreadMessage
short: Automatically send messages in new forum threads
description: Monitors a configured forum channel for new threads and automatically sends a message that gets edited after 2 seconds and optionally deleted after another 2 seconds. All message content is configurable.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any end user data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing ForumThreadMessage! Use `[p]forumthreadmessage settings` to configure the cog.
author: Claude
